name: Stroke of Luck (Nevermind3476)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022

A golf game where your ball is a die, and the power of your swing is multiplied by the number on the die. Higher rolls mean more distance but less control

Game is mostly played with the mouse, click and drag to swing, esc to pause

this is honestly more of a prototype than a proper game, but with this being my first game jam I'm just happy to have something playable to submit
